sentences.en: a doleful song about lost love
sentences.cn: 一首关于逝去的爱情的哀歌

sentences.en: Doleful and intolerable, not be not to think, talk about a love.
sentences.cn: 寂寞难耐, 不是不想, 谈个恋爱.

sentences.en: Doleful dreariness? Face alone loneliness what to kind of mentality should have?
sentences.cn: 寂寞可怕 吗 ?面对孤单寂寞应该有什么样的心理?

sentences.en: Doleful when get hurt the most easily?
sentences.cn: 寂寞的时候最容易受伤 吗 ?

sentences.en: Empty, doleful, whether to let a person remember sad, sad thing?
sentences.cn: 空虚, 寂寞, 是否让人想起伤心, 难过的事?

sentences.en: He always shows a doleful expression.
sentences.cn: 他总是露出忧郁的表情.

sentences.en: He gave me a long, doleful look.
sentences.cn: 他眼神悲伤地久久望着我。

sentences.en: His countenance , as he came on, wore an abstracted and somewhat doleful air.
sentences.cn: 他走上来的时候, 面上有着一种茫然,而且好象阴郁的神气.

sentences.en: I was doleful yesterday doleful today, who can forecast tomorrow?
sentences.cn: 昨日孤独今日寂寞明日谁能预测?

sentences.en: Other game manufacturer is unwilling also and doleful.
sentences.cn: 其它游戏厂商也不甘寂寞.

sentences.en: Then with a doleful sigh, he gave Michael a thorough frisk for a weapon.
sentences.cn: 然后他悲叹了一声,彻底搜了迈克尔的身, 看他是否带有武器.

sentences.en: Why is the person in doleful when can you feel but and sad?
sentences.cn: 为什么人在寂寞的时候会感觉到无奈和伤心?

sentences.en: Why to always feel oneself are very alone and doleful?
sentences.cn: 为什么总是感到自己很孤单寂寞?

trans.tran_cn: 令人沮丧的，悲哀的，沉闷的，阴郁的
